Module net.tangly.fsm
Package net.tangly.fsm.utilities

Class Generator<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>>

java.lang.Object
net.tangly.fsm.utilities.Generator<O,S,E>
Type Parameters:
O - the class of the instance owning the finite state machine instance
S - enumeration type for the identifiers of states
E - enumeration type for the identifiers of events
Direct Known Subclasses:
GeneratorAsciiDoc, GeneratorGraphDot, GeneratorPlantUml, GeneratorStateMachineCat
public abstract class Generator<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>> extends Object
Abstract generator to create a human-readable description of a finite state machine description.

  • Method Details

    • generateFileIfChanged

      public boolean generateFileIfChanged(@NotNull @NotNull Path path) throws IOException
      Generates the content of the file identified through the path if the file does not exist or the new creation of the output is different to the one in the file. This feature is for example helpful if the file is under version control to avoid spurious changes.
      Parameters:
      path - path to the file to updated.
      Returns:
      flag indicating if the file was updated or not
      Throws:
      IOException - if a file could not be read or written

    • generate

      public abstract void generate(@NotNull @NotNull PrintWriter writer)
      Implements the creation of the text content for a specific generator.
      Parameters:
      writer - writer to which the content shall be written

    • extension

      public abstract String extension()
      Returns the extension used by the generator when writing its output.
